SpsTemplate.InsertStoredProcedure:
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[@TableNameInsert] Script Date: @ScriptDateTime ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[@TableNameInsert] @InsertParameters AS SET NOCOUNT ON SET XACT_ABORT ON
BEGIN TRAN
INSERT INTO [dbo].@TableName (@Columns) SELECT @SelectParameters
SELECT @PrimaryIDName FROM dbo.@TableName WHERE @PrimaryIDName = SCOPE_IDENTITY() COMMIT
SpsTemplate.UpdateStoredProcedure:
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[@TableNameUpdate] Script Date: @ScriptDateTime ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[@TableNameUpdate] @UpdateParameters AS SET NOCOUNT ON SET XACT_ABORT ON
BEGIN TRAN
Update [dbo].[@TableName] SET @UpdateColumnsParameters where @PrimaryIDName = @PrimaryIDParameter SELECT * FROM [dbo].[@TableName] WHERE @PrimaryIDName = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
COMMIT
SpsTemplate.DeleteStoredProcedure:
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[@TableNameDelete] Script Date: @ScriptDateTime ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[@TableNameDelete] @DeleteParameters AS SET NOCOUNT ON SET XACT_ABORT ON
BEGIN TRAN
DELETE FROM [dbo].@TableName WHERE @PrimaryIDName = @PrimaryIDParameter
COMMIT
SpsTemplate.SelectStoredProcedure:
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[@TableNameSelect] Script Date: @ScriptDateTime ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[@TableNameSelect] @SelectParameters AS SET NOCOUNT ON SET XACT_ABORT ON
BEGIN TRAN
SELECT * FROM [dbo].@TableName WHERE (@PrimaryIDName = @PrimaryIDParameter OR @PrimaryIDParameter IS NULL)
COMMIT
SpsTemplate.SelectAllStoredProcedure:
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[@TableNameSelectALL] Script Date: @ScriptDateTime ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[@TableNameSelectALL] @MaxRows INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON SET XACT_ABORT ON
BEGIN TRAN
SELECT TOP(@MaxRows) * FROM [dbo].@TableName Order by @PrimaryIDName desc
COMMIT
